mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REVIEW (BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES (SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select:
SELECT RN, BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(TBL_REVIEW PK_REVIEW) */ ROWNUM RN, BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER , REGDATE , UPDATEDATE FROM TBL_REVIEW
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{amount} * #{pageNum}) WHERE RN >= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) - 9
